name: Scrollbar component
description:
Super flexible system scrollbars with:

  • Styles from Windows and Mac
  • Vertical and horizontal bars


and the capabilities of:

  • Resizing the scrollbar
  • Resizing the thumb
  • Defining the starting point for the thumb.


Perfect for adding realism to your mockups and design for real world scenarios. Specially if you are designing on Mac interfaces that will mostly be used on Windows.
